comment.body:
First, `escape` is depraved. (Replace it with `decodeURI`?).

Second,

```js
            if (data)  // Parse current data file
                var data = JSON.parse(data)
            else  // Not exists yet, use default data
                var data = { "message": [] }
```

Does `var` here necessary? How about just `data = `without extra declaration?

Third, `.page = new ZeroChat()`. Where is `page` declared? Or is it global?
In medium.com, readers can highlight sentences, and comment on sentences. Really nice feature.

> [comeon](#comment_1_1Jfsqd4RzqpMmnWze4WfWKTbJiDk9xagUj): 你们聚会会不会生出个零元币呀？

ZeroNet already supports BitCoin (every zeronet site address is a BitCoin address). There is no need to invent another crypto currency.

> [obiwanzanobi](#comment_2_1LUy9iAxeWsj1DP5L8V17Yb2vo87FucjgD): maybe we could have ZeroCons in different regions

Yes. Mini-ZeroCons in different regions.
How can I cancel a downloading download/seed? I have to wait it to be fully downloaded then remove them in ZeroHello files?
